oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1957-04-27 - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 1 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from April 27, 1957. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Hank Snow (host/performer), guest performer T. Texas Tyler, and regular performers Rod Brasfield, Chubby Wise, Chet Atkins, June Carter, and Stringbean. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN. It is announced that this is the 916th broadcast.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Hank Snow; Rod Brasfield; T. Texas Tyler; Chubby Wise; Chet Atkins
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Grant Turner introduces Hank Snow -- I'm Moving On (Hank Snow) -- Opening statement (Grant Turner, Hank Snow) -- Hank Snow introduces Rod Brasfield -- Comedy routine (Rod Brasfield, Hank Snow) -- Hank Snow introduces T. Texas Tyler -- Bumming Around (T. Texas Tyler) -- Prince Albert commercial (Rod Brasfield, Hank Snow) -- Hank Snow introduces Chubby Wise -- Sally Gooden (Chubby Wise fiddle) -- Hank Snow talks -- His Hands (Hank Snow) -- Hank Snow introduces Chet Atkins -- Gay Ranchero (Chet Atkins)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Turner, Grant; United States. Armed Forces Radio Service; Brasfield, Rod; Atkins, Chet; Wise, Chubby; Stringbean, 1915-1973; Cash, June Carter, 1929-2003; Snow, Hank; Tyler, T. Texas
